name: Diggy the Dog
description:
Our dog is strange, for sure. I mean, not in the usual cute way, it doesn't walk on two paws or play chess or something. It's just... I sense something uncanny in it, something wicked, as if it knew something.

Or maybe I'm just overreacting. Of course, every dog tries to bury it's bone as deep as possible. But I assure you, this dog doesn't keep it's bones in the backyard. Something like the temple of an ancient cult suits it more. I just can't stand this dog.

You play as a dog trying to bury its bone in a very specific spot deep under ground. You can throw it with `k` to stun creatures, run with `wasd` and jump with `spacebar` (hold it to jump higher). Catching the bone while airborne gives you an extra jump.

Credits:

  • Igor - programming.
  • Veronika - visuals.
